section.title: Purpose
section.para: JHotDraw 8 is a framework for drawing editors written in the Java programming language.
It consists of two parts which can be used independently:

The drawing editor framework can be used to realize drawing editors for computer aided design and for artistic drawings. Drawings can be animated and interactive. It is possible to back a drawing with a data model, allowing a structured drawing editor to be used as a user interface for the data model.
The application framework can be used to create applications which comply to platform-specific user interface guidelines. Such as such as and .
